byline.contributor: Heba Afify contributed reporting from Cairo.

snippet: Tunisia’s transitional prime minister, Beji Caid Essebsi, who has a record of pressing for change from within, says freedom cannot be granted all at once.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Tunisia’s transitional prime minister, Beji Caid Essebsi, who has a record of pressing for change from within, says freedom cannot be granted all at once.

headline.main: Interim Tunisian Leader With Ties to Old Ruler Defends a Gradual Path
headline.print_headline: Interim Tunisian Leader With Ties to Old Ruler Defends a Gradual Path
headline.seo: Tunisia’s Interim Leader Essebsi Defends Gradualist Path
